page.title: 02WESTER MANBEEN FARM
page.content: Wester Manbeen Farm is the biggest farm in our area.The name comes from the French meaning"My Good Land".It has 300 hectares of crop growing land and more is being reclaimed from Clodoch Quarry.There are 6 large fields and the farm has 28 hectares of trees for shelter. Wester Manbeen is a dairy farm with 180 milking Fresian cows.The milking parlour has very modern machinery which can milk 16 cows at a time.It has two containers for milk which hold 3,400 litres.This is sold to the Milk Marketing Board.Without additives to the milk the cows produce 4% cream and 96% milk.The cows are fed on waste from the distillery mixed with cut grass.There are two dairymen who milk the cows twice a day.The farmer has not bought a cow for 25 years.
